title: sse-chat
description: Realtime Tchat Application using SvelteJS And Server Sent Events

scripts.build-all: (cd backend/ && cargo build) & (cd frontend && npm run build && cp -R public/ ../backend/public)
scripts.dev-backend: cd backend/ && rm -rf public/* && cargo run
scripts.start-all: cd backend/ && export CORS_ALLOW_ORIGIN="http://localhost:5050" && cargo run
